**Tender for Highway Tractors Rental**

**Project Description**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Regional Individual Standing Offer for the rental of highway tractors to the Technical Services Transportation Company at 5 Canadian Division Support Base (5 CDSB) Gagetown in Oromocto, New Brunswick. The contract period will be from April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2025, with an option to extend for two additional one-year periods.

**Background**

The current bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number W0501-24M029/A, dated December 22, 2023. Bidders who responded to the previous solicitation will have the opportunity to request a debriefing or feedback session.

**Request for Standing Offer**

The solicitation seeks a Standing Offer covering the rental of highway tractors, as described in the attached Statement of Requirement (SOR). The equipment will be used on an "as and when requested" basis by the Service Site Authority.

**UNSPSC Classification**

The subject of this solicitation is classified under UNSPSC 25102100 (Truck tractors) and UNSPSC 78111808 (Vehicle rental).

**Public Tender Number**

The public tender number is WS4317150474. The amendment number is 2.

**Description of Trade Agreements**

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Dates**

* Publication date: January 23, 2024
* Tender closing date: February 9, 2024, 2:00 PM local time

**Contact Information**

For further information, please contact:

Kristelle LeBlanc (SPAC/PSPC)
